rounds.meaning: Animals are an example of a living thing. They need food, water, and air to live and grow. Some animals can walk, fly, swim, and crawl.
Cars are an example of a non-living thing. It does not grow and cannot move without other humans.
Humans are an example of a living thing. They need food, water, and air to live and can move by walking or crawling.
Pencils are an example of a non-living thing. It does not grow and cannot move on its own.
Plants are an example of a living thing. They need food, water, air, and sunlight to live and grow. Plants can bend towards light for growth or sometimes even move to capture prey.
